pseudo class
-----------
-it represent a special state of an element 
syntax 
--------
selector :pseudo class{
  property:value
}

-link,visited,hover,active

pseudo element-
--------------
it is use to style a particular part of a element
 syntax---
 ------
 selector::pseudo-element{
  property:value;
 }
 -eg : first-letter,first-line,after,before,mark

 position
 ----------
 1)relative-placed at the position it is created
 2)absolute-placed relative to the ancestor which is having the position relative property

 properties like top, bottom, left and right can only be applied to the tag which is having position properties
 -if there is no tag having relative property-it applied to the tag which is having position properties
